alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:38PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado through 915 PM MDT... At 838 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cheyenne Wells around 850 PM MDT. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 140 and 160, and between mile markers 166 and 168. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Colorado. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central Kansas.
